mapper.select: select b.bdNo, p.pdNo, b.bdTitle, bdContent, p.pdName, p.pdPrice, p.pdImg, b.bdView, b.memID, p.pdSell from TB_BOARD as b inner join TB_PRODUCT as p on b.bdNo = p.pdNo order by b.bdNo asc;

select b.bdNo, p.pdNo, b.bdTitle, bdContent, p.pdName, p.pdPrice, p.pdImg, b.bdView, b.memID, p.pdSell from TB_BOARD as b inner join TB_PRODUCT as p on b.bdNo = p.pdNo where p.pdSell != "1" order by b.bdNo asc;

select b.bdNo, p.pdNo, b.bdTitle, bdContent, p.pdName, p.pdPrice, p.pdImg, b.bdView, b.memID, p.pdSell from TB_BOARD as b inner join TB_PRODUCT as p on b.bdNo = p.pdNo where p.pdSell != 1 order by b.bdNo desc;
select b.bdNo, p.pdNo, b.bdTitle, bdContent, p.pdName, p.pdPrice, p.pdImg, b.bdView, b.memID, p.pdSell from TB_BOARD as b inner join TB_PRODUCT as p on b.bdNo = p.pdNo order by b.bdView desc;

select b.bdNo, p.pdNo, b.bdTitle, bdContent, p.pdName, p.pdPrice, p.pdImg, b.bdView, b.memID, p.pdSell from TB_BOARD as b inner join TB_PRODUCT as p on b.bdNo = p.pdNo where p.ctNo = #{ctNo} order by b.bdNo asc;

select b.bdNo, p.pdNo, b.bdTitle, bdContent, p.pdName, p.pdPrice, p.pdImg, b.bdView, b.memID, p.pdSell from TB_BOARD as b inner join TB_PRODUCT as p on b.bdNo = p.pdNo where p.location = #{locName} order by b.bdNo asc;

select b.bdNo, p.pdNo, b.bdTitle, bdContent, p.pdName, p.pdPrice, p.pdImg, b.bdView, b.memID, p.pdSell from TB_BOARD as b inner join TB_PRODUCT as p on b.bdNo = p.pdNo where b.bdNo = #{bdNo} order by b.bdNo asc;

select b.bdNo, p.pdNo, b.bdTitle, bdContent, p.pdName, p.pdPrice, p.pdImg, b.bdView, b.memID, p.dealType, p.pdSell, p.location from TB_BOARD as b inner join TB_PRODUCT as p on b.bdNo = p.pdNo where b.bdNo = #{bdNo} order by b.bdNo asc;
mapper.insert: insert into TB_BOARD ( bdNo, memID, bdTitle, bdContent )values( #{bdNo}, #{writer}, #{bdTitle}, #{bdContent} )
insert into TB_BOARD (ctNo, memID, memName, bdTitle, bdContent, bdDate) values (#{ctNo}, #{memID}, #{memName}, #{bdTitle}, #{bdContent}, #{writeDate})
mapper.select: SELECT bdNo FROM TB_BOARD WHERE memID=#{memID} and bdDate=#{writeDate} and bdTitle=#{bdTitle}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_PRODUCT (bdNo, ctNo, pdName, pdUpDate, pdImg, pdPrice, dealType, memID, location) values (#{bdNo}, #{ctNo}, #{pdName}, #{pdUpDate}, #{pdImg}, #{pdPrice}, #{dealType}, #{memID}, "주안")
mapper.update: update TB_BOARD set ctNo = #{ctNo}, bdTitle = #{bdTitle}, bdContent = #{bdContent} where bdNo = #{bdNo}
update TB_PRODUCT set ctNo = #{ctNo}, dealType = #{dealType}, pdName = #{pdName}, pdPrice = #{pdPrice}, pdUpDate = #{pdUpDate} where bdNo = #{bdNo}
update TB_BOARD set bdView = (bdView + 1) where bdNo = #{bdNo}
mapper.select: SELECT bdNo FROM TB_BOARD WHERE (bdTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR bdContent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY bdNo DESC
mapper.insert: insert into TB_CS(csTitle, csContent, csDate, memID) values (#{csTitle}, #{csContent}, now(), #{memID})
mapper.update: update TB_PRODUCT set comOpponent=#{oppID},pdSell = true, comDate = now() where bdNo = #{bdNo}
